title: Pat Yourself On The Back (with Shaka King & Dorothy A. Brown)
description:
Kaya Henderson sits down with Shaka King, the director and co-writer of "Judas and the Black Messiah". Netta Elzie gives an update on what's happening with the nationwide protests. DeRay interviews author/professor Dorothy A. Brown about racial discrepancies in American tax law.


For a transcript of this episode, please visit crooked.com/podsavethepeople
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
